short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making LexisNexis usable and a little less ugly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PrettyLexi is a simple Chrome extension that alters the article layout of LexisNexis (serif as body text, increased font size, increased line height) and adds some functionality to export the selected text without switching to a text editor.

I made this extension because I was annoyed by the LexisNexis interface. I have no affiliation with LexisNexis or Relx.

Icon by Sergey Minkin, the Noun Project
